# ABUI Components

ABUI components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [ABUI](https://www.abui.io/).

## Components

- RadioTabs - [Source](https://www.abui.io/components/radio-tabs)
- ScrollProgress - [Source](https://www.abui.io/components/scroll-progress)
- ScrollRevealContent - [Source](https://www.abui.io/blocks/scroll-reveal-content-a)
- Timeline - [Source](https://www.abui.io/blocks/timeline)
